attributes.action: Not "steal"cash from the good causes supported by the Lottery Fund to pay for the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should not take more money from the lottery fund to help the Olympics  and therefore reduce the cash going to good causes all over the country. Also, no further public money should be thrown away on this frivolous waste of money!
